nodes.text: Durge's pilot droid flew Durge's ship during the Gen'Dai's final year of life. The droid somewhat resembled Durge in appearance and temperament. The droid was decapitated by Obi-Wan Kenobi, although its head remained functional. Obi-Wan captured the head and used it to track down Dooku and Asajj Ventress to Boz Pity.
